identity.name: Kuldeep Joshi
identity.title: Engineering Manager (MBA, MSc CS)
identity.summary: Strategic Engineering Leader with over 10 years of experience delivering scalable, high-performance software solutions across startups and global organisations.
identity.bio: I design and optimize robust cloud platforms with GCP, Kubernetes, and microservices while mentoring engineering teams toward sustainable delivery.

summary: I have built scalable systems using Python, Java, and PHP. I specialize in designing and optimizing robust cloud systems using modern tech like GCP, Kubernetes, and Microservices, always focusing on reliability and clean architecture. I am passionate about leading and mentoring engineering teams, and my dedication to people development was recognized with an external mentorship award. With an executive MBA from the London School of Economics (LSE) and a MSc in Computing Science, I bring a strong blend of technical expertise and strategic insight. Having worked in diverse, multicultural environments, I thrive on aligning teams with meaningful outcomes.
highlights: 10+ years leading high-performing engineering squads across fintech and logistics platforms
Award-winning mentor with a passion for people development and inclusive culture
Architect of scalable cloud-native systems tuned for resilience, observability, and clean execution

experience.summary: Lead full-stack squads shipping B2B and B2C fintech experiences while safeguarding reliability for Clover’s Android and cloud ecosystems.
achievements: Led the design, development, and support of microservices and web APIs using Python and Java, enabling seamless integration with Clover’s payment platform.
Managed a team of eight engineers handling escalations, troubleshooting API issues, and analysing platform behaviour for enterprise clients.
Facilitated monthly and quarterly business reviews with senior leaders across engineering and operations to align goals and delivery.
Optimised GCP deployments for cost efficiency while maintaining high availability during growing transaction volumes.
Tuned MySQL and MongoDB data stores for low-latency financial transaction workloads.
Automated incident workflows with Python services, accelerating response time for critical production events.
Mentored engineers on secure backend development, API craftsmanship, and cloud deployment strategies.
Served as SME for Clover APIs, SDKs, and SaaS platforms to resolve complex customer integrations.
Improved technical support SLA response time by 30% with Python automation tooling.
Partnered across functions to uphold reliability and rapid resolution for enterprise accounts.

experience.summary: Volunteer mentor for the Python Software Delivery zone supporting emerging engineers.
achievements: Mentored a student team through Python and Java project delivery, winning the final showcase competition.
Provided hands-on guidance for API integrations and best practices in software delivery.
Recognised with best mentorship award for the cohort.

experience.summary: Delivered mission-critical transport planning, customer portal, and fleet management products with PHP and LAMP.
achievements: Built automated microservices that increased job-processing efficiency by 20%.
Shipped Android apps integrating Google APIs with backend services and published to Google Play.
Deployed and maintained services on Apache via CI/CD pipelines.

experience.summary: Developed Laravel-based web applications for a hospitality marketplace while managing MySQL data models.
achievements: Implemented object-oriented PHP patterns to streamline feature delivery.
Maintained secure data flows for bookings and customer management before pursuing MSc studies.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Application
